mapper.select: SELECT L.IMG, L.LECT_NUM, S.SUBJ_NUM, S.SUBJ_NAME, L.LECT_NAME, B.BOOK_NUM, B.BOOK_NAME, L.PRICE, L.EXPLANATION FROM LECTURE L, SUBJECT S, BOOK B WHERE L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM AND L.LECT_NUM = #{lect_num}

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, L.LECT_NUM, L.EXPLANATION, S.SUBJ_NUM, S.SUBJ_NAME, L.LECT_NAME, B.BOOK_NUM, B.BOOK_NAME, L.PRICE, L.IMG FROM LECTURE L, SUBJECT S, BOOK B WHERE L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM
SELECT COUNT(*) TOTALROWS FROM LECTURE L, SUBJECT S, BOOK B WHERE L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM

SELECT ROWNUM rnum, L.LECT_NUM, S.SUBJ_NUM, S.SUBJ_NAME, L.LECT_NAME, B.BOOK_NUM, B.BOOK_NAME, L.PRICE FROM LECTURE L, SUBJECT S, BOOK B WHERE L.SUBJ_NUM = S.SUBJ_NUM AND L.BOOK_NUM = B.BOOK_NUM AND L.SUBJ_NUM = #{subj_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO LECTURE (LECT_NUM, SUBJ_NUM, LECT_NAME, BOOK_NUM, PRICE, IMG, EXPLANATION) VALUES (LECTURE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{subj_num}, #{lect_name}, #{book_num}, #{price}, #{img}, #{explanation})
